description: Sex and Love Addicts Anonymous is a 12-step recovery program for people who wish to stop their compulsive sexual behavior or their obsessive relationships. Meetings are held Monday through Sunday. Please call to verify time. Online meetings and Skype meetings are held in English and Spanish. Spanish meetings can contact people in South America as well. There is an open meeting held each week for anyone wanting to educate themselves more on the information.
name: SEX & LOVE ADDICTS ANONYMOUS
